title: God Is Not a "Super-Thing" (Even Christians Can Misunderstand This!) | Paul Anleitner
description:
There's a misconception about what the word "God" means, and it's something that many Christians even get wrong.
I'm no visual artist, but maybe a little theology doodle can help us better understand a more historic Christian vision of God and the created cosmic hierarchy.

#theology

To support this channel and the Deep Talks podcast:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast
